casebody.data:
Leon JONES, Appellant, v. W. H. HIATT, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Atlanta, Ga., Appellee. No. 12652. United States Court of Appeals Fifth Circuit. May 3, 1949. No appearance for appellant. J. Ellis Mundy, U. S. Atty., and Harvey H. Tisinger, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of Atlanta, Ga., for appellee. "

Before HOLMES, McCORD, and WALLER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the Court below is affirmed.
